scenario_text.value: Oh no! She’s in such bad shape!
Wait, Miu! You shouldn’t move her!
Ah...ahh... Lady Miu...
Hold on, we’re here to rescue you!
Can we...do anything for injuries like this?
...I don’t think so.

Lady Miu... Thank you...so much for coming...
Hurry, run away...

What’re you saying?! You have to come with
us...
Miu... You should listen to her last words.
Her...last words?
I... I’m so happy I met you...Lady...Miu...
Wait, I...
We were too late...
I don’t believe it... *sniff* Nngh...
Don’t cry, Miu...
Kaito...?

You wanna save the others, yeah? Then there
ain’t no time for blubbering now.

The heck, Kaito? How can you be so harsh at
a—
No. He’s right, Takuma.
Thank you, Kaito. My eyes are wide open now.
Yeah, you’re right...

You help out too. Let’s save as many of these
little ones as we can.
You got it.

(Those two are...somehow getting through to
each other.)
